mod.name: Bundle Of Potions
mod.description:
A collection of 54 potions! 
 Features 15+ for each rarity.

potions.name: Test 448
potions.description:
'Potion 0 bundle_of_potions:Test448
Gain 21 Dexterity.
So powerful its banned in most places.

potions.name: Angry Tankard
potions.description: Draw 3 cards. Enter Wrath.

potions.name: Assembly Jar
potions.description: Gain Master Reality and 1 Cloak and Dagger+.

potions.name: Basic Stat Potion
potions.description: Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.

potions.name: Berry Juice
potions.description: Gain 2 Max HP.

potions.name: Blurry Potion
potions.description: Gain 2 Blur.

potions.name: Bottled Memento
potions.description:
ALL combatants gain 1 Vulnerable.
Even you!

potions.name: Buckler in a Bottle
potions.description: Gain Block equal to 35% of current incoming damage, then next turn gain 35% of this amount.

potions.name: Cawing Flask
potions.description: Add 2 Claw+ to your hand.

potions.name: Chilli Sauce
potions.description: Gain 5 Fire Breathing.

potions.name: Chiseling Chocolate
potions.description: Always heal 2 HP, then make ALL enemies lose 5 HP.

potions.name: Foul-smelling Brew
potions.description: Gain 3 Noxious Fumes.

potions.name: Garlic Bottle
potions.description: Apply 1 Weak to all enemies.

potions.name: Honey Extract
potions.description:
Gain 4 Sadistic and
1 Noxious.

potions.name: Hypnotic Bottle
potions.description: Draw 4 Cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn.

potions.name: Snake™
potions.description: Gain 4 Malleable and 1 Blur.

potions.name: Snecko's Salad Cream
potions.description: Remove ALL Plated Armor, Metallicize, Thorns, Malleable, Buffer, Artifact, Regenerate and Barricade from ALL enemies. If you do: Heal 7 HP.

potions.name: Storm in a Jar
potions.description: Gain 1 Storm.

potions.name: Succ Potion
potions.description: Enemy loses up to 6 HP and Heal equal to HP the enemy lost.

potions.name: Thonkerbottle
potions.description: Gain 1 Curiosity.

potions.name: Vial of Concentrated Soothing Balm
potions.description: Exhaust ALL status and curse cards.

potions.name: Advanced Stat Potion
potions.description: Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity, Plated Armor and Thorns.

potions.name: Aftershock Potion
potions.description: Deal 3 damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies 3 times.

potions.name: Bamboozling Brew
potions.description: Add 1 Safety+ and Smite+ to your hand.

potions.name: Clean Bottle
potions.description: Permanently gain 1 potion slot.

potions.name: Foxy Shot
potions.description: Gain 1 After Image, Blur and Dexterity.

potions.name: Fungi in a Bottle
potions.description: Target explodes in 4 Turns, instantly dying and dealing 30 damage to you.

potions.name: Immovable Vessel
potions.description: Gain 24 Block and 1 Entangled.

potions.name: Judgement Flask
potions.description: Instantly kill the targeted Monster if it has less than 30 HP.

potions.name: Pickle Juice
potions.description:
Targeted enemy ALWAYS loses 3 Strength.
Some enemies are allergic to pickles.

potions.name: Rainbow Bottle
potions.description: Channel 1 of each vanilla Orb.

potions.name: Sapping Potion
potions.description: Enemy gains Weak and loses Strength equal to your current energy multiplied by 1.

potions.name: Smashing Tankard
potions.description: Add 1 Bludgeon+ to your hand and gain 1 free attack.

potions.name: Springy Potion
potions.description: Draw 2 cards and discard 2 cards then gain 2 Accuracy and add 2 Shiv+ to your hand

potions.name: Sticky Tar Jar
potions.description: Apply 1 Slow.

potions.name: Tossable Smoke Bomb
potions.description:
If the target is Intangible it dies instantly.
Deals immense damage to targets with Invincible or similar powers. Also applies 9 Poison and removes all block from the target.

potions.name: Tower Shield in a Bottle
potions.description: Gain Block equal to 70% of current incoming damage, then next turn gain 70% of this amount.

potions.name: Weapon Coating
potions.description: Gain 1 Envenom and Strength.

potions.name: 100% Grapefruit Juice
potions.description:
Add 1 Burn+ to all active piles and gain a 27 Damage Combust.
Tastes almost as good as orange juice.

potions.name: Bunker in a Bottle
potions.description: Gain Block equal to 100% of current incoming damage, then next turn gain 100% of this amount.

potions.name: Creative Tincture
potions.description: Gain 1 Creative, Infinite Blades and Battle Hymn.

potions.name: Crippling Potion
potions.description: Enemy loses 1 Strength each turn, is given 2 Weak and 6 Poison.

potions.name: Designer's Aftershave
potions.description:
Cannot be used in combat.

Remove ALL status and curse cards, then randomly upgrade 1 Card.

potions.name: Dragonfruit Drops
potions.description: Gain 20 Vigor.

potions.name: Fabricate Oils
potions.description: On use obtain 1 War Paint.

potions.name: Imposter Extract
potions.description:
Gain 1 Intangible and 1 Phantasmal.
When the potion is sus?!

potions.name: Lost Piggy Bank
potions.description: Can be thrown in any combat room to gain 101 Gold.

potions.name: Mini-Nuke in a Bottle
potions.description: Deal 30 Damage and apply 9 Poison to ALL enemies.

potions.name: Omega Extract
potions.description: Gain 29 Omega.

potions.name: Sake
potions.description: On use gain 12 Strength and lose 3 Dexterity.

potions.name: Sealed Lemon Float
potions.description:
Permanently obtain 1 Copy of the common Relic,
Lemon Float.

potions.name: Smash Potion
potions.description: Gain the effect of 1 Random vanilla form card, hated by a certain orange creature.

potions.name: Strategy in a Bottle
potions.description: At the end of your turn retain up to 2 cards and at the start of your turn draw and discard 1 cards.

potions.name: Super Stat Potion
potions.description: Gain 2 Strength, Dexterity, Metallicize, Thorns and Omega.

potions.name: Volcanic Offering
potions.description: Lose 6 HP and gain 2 Demon Form, 1 Dark Embrace, 5 Fire Breathing and 1 Combust.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.
